name: TElezabeth Engineering
overview:
Incorporated in the year 1977, we, “T. Elezabeth Engineering Works”, are counted amongst the leading firms which are engaged in manufacturing and supplying a commendable gamut of Pressure Control Valves. In order to serve our esteemed patrons, we are also providing cutting edge maintenance and repairing services for offered products to ensure their trouble free operations at the clients’ sites. All these products are manufactured with superior raw material.

Value Proposition: Sincerity, Dedication and Customer satisfaction are the key values. Utmost priority is given in meeting customer’s need and requirement. On time delivery of components and highest quality of work is maintained.

Our Team: Mechanical engineers Managers Logistic personnel Quality analysts Sales and marketing personnel Skilled & semi-skilled laborers Warehouse & packaging personnel Administration personal

Our Infrastructure: For systematic execution of our business operations, we have developed a spacious infrastructure which is sprawling over a huge area of land. It is installed with all the required resources so as to manufacture and supply our broad range of Pressure Control Valves.

Quality Policy: We well-recognized as a quality-focused manufacturer and supplier of Fittings, Pressure Reducing and Pressure Control Valves. While manufacturing these products and providing maintenance and repairing services for the same, we emphasize on quality.

Client Satisfaction: While manufacturing and supplying our gamut of Pressure Control Valves and providing maintenance and repairing services for these products, we emphasize on maximum client-satisfaction. We provide our clients qualitative products which are manufactured in tandem with their exact requirements.

Why Us?: Quality range of Products Timely delivery Competitive prices Pro-customer approach Ethical business policies
